lam_hero.headline: Life at Millennium
lam_hero.description: Learn more about our people, culture and insights here and stay connected on our social channels.

articles.post_content: Pranat Pathak, Millennium’s Chief Information Officer, EMEA, and Global Head of Fixed Income, Commodities and Risk Technology, shares his perspective on the evolution of technology in investment management and what Millennium is doing to navigate rapidly evolving markets.

Learn more about our employees’ career journeys through our “How I Got Here” series.

In this feature, we spoke with Abhishek Bagri, a graduate of IIT Kharagpur and current Team Lead in our FIC & Risk Technology division in Bengaluru, India. Read more on Abhishek’s journey below.
articles.post_title: How I Got Here with Abhishek

articles.post_content:
Our Women of Millennium Network (WOMN) empowers and connects women at the firm through opportunities for networking, professional development and mentoring.

Recently, the network hosted end-of-year networking events around the globe. Colleagues from Bengaluru, Hong Kong, London, New York, Tokyo and Singapore gathered for evenings of socializing and celebrating a productive year of mentorship, speaker sessions, workshops and more.

Learn more about our employee networks: mlp.com/careers
articles.post_title: Women of Millennium Network End-of-Year Events

articles.post_content: Meet Michael Chung, Global Co-Head of Equities who partnered with award-winning sushi chefs to create New York City restaurant, Nami Nori. At both Millennium and Nami Nori, Michael takes inspiration from the entrepreneurial culture that surrounds him.

Wondering how to continue growing in your career? Our Global Co-Head, HR Business Partners, Dawn Mackenzie shares her career mobility advice.

  • Find a Mentor
    • Finding a good mentor at any stage of your career is a great way to gain additional insights, increase your network and help expand your knowledge base. Millennium offers formal and informal mentorship programs.
  • Join Career Development Workshops
    • Leaning into the firm's training platforms to further your intellectual curiosity will help you develop in your professional career.
  • Network
    • Build relationships across the firm and at varying levels. A great way to do this is through joining one of the firm’s six employee networks that matter to you.
  • Set Goals
    • Set clear objectives with your manager and maintain an open dialogue about your accomplishments and areas of focus for the coming year. Millennium encourages career conversations, including goal-setting, for managers and employees.
articles.post_title: Level Up Your Career Mobility with Dawn

articles.post_content: In celebration of Global Diversity Awareness Month, Millennium’s employee networks came together to host a panel conversation between Morgan Stanley’s Sam Lalanne, Royal Bank of Canada’s Gregory Reaves and Millennium’s Karyn Geringer and Lena Tamarkin on the importance of allyship and inclusion.
Prakash Subramanian, Millennium’s CEO, India, shares insights on the firm’s growth in India.

Learn more about our employees’ career journeys through our “How I Got Here” series.

In this feature, we spoke with Bimal Manak. Bimal started her career at Millennium in 2018 as an intern, and then transitioned to a full-time role as an Operations Analyst in London. Now, she is a Trade Support Specialist based in New York City. Read more on Bimal’s journey below.
articles.post_title: How I Got Here with Bimal

articles.post_content:
Millennium’s Learning Engineering and Data (LEaD) program provides early career software engineers with the opportunity to accelerate their career growth at the intersection of finance and technology in Miami.

Software engineers with 2+ years of experience who are interested in learning about technology in finance and the various parts of Millennium’s business are invited to apply.

LEaD engineers work alongside technology leadership and mentors on high impact projects that span various teams and technical fields. LEaD engineers also participate in a robust training curriculum focused on developing both hard and soft skills.

At the end of the program, LEaD engineers transition into one of our four technology divisions.

Shreya Gupta Sharma, a current member of the LEaD program, says that “LEaD at Millennium has given me insight into a range of departments, helping me to fully understand our operational framework and technology infrastructure.”
articles.post_title: Millennium's Learning Engineering and Data (LEaD) Program

articles.post_content:
Prepping for an upcoming tech interview? Our Global Head of Talent Acquisition, John Talarico, shares his top tips to keep in mind when interviewing for a tech role.

  • Unlock your potential impact.
    • Demonstrate your abstract reasoning skills and creativity.
  • Seek news ways of solving problems.
    • Bring examples of ownership and initiative.
  • Focus on collaboration
    • Show how you can work together in a team to solve problems
  • Drive a culture that powers innovation
    • Contribute your individual strength to make a collective impact
articles.post_title: Level Up Your Tech Interview with John

articles.post_content:
In January, the Women in Technology Americas (WIT) Network held a 2024 kickoff reception in both our New York and Miami offices.

Both receptions were connected via Webex for remarks by WIT Steering Committee members Cristina Mota-Docu, Head of Operational Transformation, and Jennifer Suh, Head of Corporate Technology Business Analysis and Project Management.

WIT’s mission is focused on connecting and developing women in technology at Millennium, creating a community that attracts, empowers, develops, and retains.
articles.post_title: Millennium's Women in Tech Employee Network Kick-Off

articles.post_content: Hear how Miami-based Cristina Mota-Docu and London-based Emma Saheed learn by asking the right questions and collaborating with one another.

article.post_content: Meet Isabelle, a former Intern who describes her journey from studying biomedical engineering at Trinity College, Dublin to now working full-time as an IT Analyst at Millennium.
Meet Gauthier, a former intern in London and now full-time Quantitative Researcher in Hong Kong. He highlights the professional development and mentorship opportunities offered across Millennium.
Meet Seth, a former intern who found his path from Millennium’s internship program to full-time Middle Office Analyst in Singapore.

article-topic.name: Around the Firm
article-topic.description: Here at Millennium, we strive to build talented teams that bring together diverse perspectives. Learn more about what is happening in our global offices.

article-topic.name: Career Development
article-topic.description: Our people are in pursuit of what’s next, striving to grow their individual skills and deliver excellence. Read more about how our employees develop their careers at Millennium.

article-topic.name: Students
article-topic.description: Read how Millennium interns make an impact from day one while contributing ideas, taking on real-world challenges and learning from the firm’s subject matter experts.

article-topic.name: Technology
article-topic.description: Our technologists have the flexibility and resources to build bespoke solutions to complex problems. Learn more about our teams and how they power innovation at Millennium.

article-topic.name: What We Do
article-topic.description: Millennium seeks to empower talented professionals with sophisticated expertise, resources and technology. Learn more about our entrepreneurial approach.

article-series.name: Built Together
article-series.description: Our teams of global technologists build tools to help Millennium’s portfolio managers work more efficiently and effectively. Here we tell a few stories about how working together creates powerful results.

article-series.name: Entrepreneurial Thinkers
article-series.description: At Millennium we are all entrepreneurs. We’re passionate about helping entrepreneurial talent turn vision into reality. See how a selection of our entrepreneurs have harnessed their potential at Millennium.

article-series.name: Find Your Path
article-series.description: We delve into the professional journeys of our people, and how they found their path at Millennium.

article-series.name: Interns: Then and Now
article-series.description: Millennium offers students a place to launch their careers, gaining real world, hands-on experience from day one.

article-series.name: Level Up
article-series.description: Check out our people's top career advice and explore how you can make an impact.

article-series.name: mChats
article-series.description: We chat with our people about their top career advice, time at Millennium, and their personal hobbies.
